metadata.title: CVE-2020-24352 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in QEMU through 5.1.0. An out-of-bounds memoryaccess was found in the ATI VGA device implementation. This flaw occurs inthe ati_2d_blt() routine in hw/display/ati_2d.c while handling MMIO writeoperations through the ati_mm_write() callback. A malicious guest could usethis flaw to crash the QEMU process on the host, resulting in a denial ofservice.

criterions.comment: qemu package in focal is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
